author: hship
msg: tutorial:
- Add a new tab, Fields, and the start of a demo of validating input fields.

author: hship
msg: tutorial:
- Add images for "Update" and "Continue" on the Palette page.
- Fix the Palette page (was using the wrong property bundle path).
- Add more descriptive text to the Palette page.

author: hship
msg: Bump framework version up to 1.0.7.
junit:
- Make a successful run required to generate a build
framework:
- Improve the properties explorer, making it more robust
in terms of exceptions and the browser back button
- Display request parameters earlier when emitting RequestContext
as HTML
tutorial:
- Consolidate a bunch of one-off apps as pages in
the new Workbench app
- Reorganize the Tutorial project to ease debugging
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag
'release-1-0-6'.

author: hship
msg: Release 1.0.6
